mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTION( Q_NO, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENT, Q_ENROLLDATE, Q_M_NO) VALUES(SEQ_QUESTIONS.NEXTVAL, #{q_title}, #{q_content}, SYSDATE, #{q_m_no})
mapper.update: UPDATE QUESTION SET Q_TITLE = #{q_title}, Q_CONTENT = #{q_content}, Q_ENROLLDATE = SYSDATE WHERE Q_NO = #{q_no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(C_NO) FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.M_NO = C.C_WRITERNO) WHERE C_STATUS = 'Y' AND M_NO = ${m_no}
